vision: A groundbreaking research paper that demonstrates automation of the scrum process in project planning from product vision to sprint review using large language models

features.name: Automated Product Backlog Creation
features.explanation: Develop a feature that uses large language models to automatically generate a product backlog based on the product vision and user stories.
features.reasoning: This feature will save time and effort in creating a product backlog, and will ensure that all necessary user stories are included.

features.name: Automated Sprint Planning
features.explanation: Develop a feature that uses large language models to automatically generate a sprint plan based on the product backlog and team capacity.
features.reasoning: This feature will save time and effort in creating a sprint plan, and will ensure that the team is working on the most important user stories.

features.name: Automated Sprint Review
features.explanation: Develop a feature that uses large language models to automatically generate a sprint review report based on the sprint backlog and user stories completed.
features.reasoning: This feature will save time and effort in creating a sprint review report, and will ensure that all completed user stories are properly documented.

features.name: Automated Sprint Retrospective
features.explanation: Develop a feature that automates the sprint retrospective process by analyzing team feedback and generating insights for improvement.
features.reasoning: This feature will help teams to identify areas of improvement and take corrective actions in a timely manner, leading to better performance and higher quality output.

features.name: Automated Sprint Progress Tracking
features.explanation: Develop a feature that tracks the progress of each sprint automatically and generates reports for stakeholders.
features.reasoning: This feature will help stakeholders to stay informed about the progress of the project and make informed decisions based on real-time data. It will also help teams to identify potential roadblocks and take corrective actions in a timely manner.

features.name: Automated Sprint Goal Setting
features.explanation: Develop a feature that automates the process of setting sprint goals based on the product vision and team capacity.
features.reasoning: This feature will help teams to set realistic and achievable goals for each sprint, leading to better performance and higher quality output. It will also help stakeholders to stay informed about the progress of the project and make informed decisions based on real-time data.

features.name: Automated Sprint Burndown Chart Generation
features.explanation: The system will automatically generate a burndown chart for each sprint, displaying the progress of the team towards the sprint goal.
features.reasoning: This feature will provide a visual representation of the team's progress towards the sprint goal, allowing for quick identification of any issues that may arise during the sprint.

features.name: Automated Sprint Capacity Planning
features.explanation: The system will automatically calculate the team's capacity for each sprint, taking into account team member availability, holidays, and other factors.
features.reasoning: This feature will help the team plan sprints more effectively, ensuring that they are not overcommitting and that they have enough capacity to complete the sprint goal.

features.name: Automated Sprint Task Assignment
features.explanation: Automatically assign tasks to team members based on their skills and availability
features.reasoning: This feature will save time and effort in task assignment, and ensure that the right person is assigned to the right task

features.name: Automated Sprint Risk Management
features.explanation: Automatically identify and manage potential risks during the sprint
features.reasoning: This feature will help the team to proactively manage risks and avoid potential issues that could impact the sprint

features.name: Automated Sprint Backlog Creation
features.explanation: Automatically generate a sprint backlog based on the product backlog and sprint goal
features.reasoning: This feature will save time and effort for the team by automating the creation of the sprint backlog, allowing them to focus on more important tasks.

features.name: Automated Sprint Review Report Generation
features.explanation: Automatically generate a report summarizing the sprint review meeting
features.reasoning: This feature will save time and effort for the team by automating the creation of the sprint review report, allowing them to focus on more important tasks.

features.name: Automated User Story Prioritization
features.explanation: Using natural language processing, the system will automatically prioritize user stories based on their importance and relevance to the product vision.
features.reasoning: Prioritizing user stories is a crucial step in the Scrum process, and automating this step will save time and ensure that the most important stories are addressed first.

features.name: Automated Sprint Task Estimation
features.explanation: The system will use machine learning algorithms to automatically estimate the time required to complete each task in a sprint.
features.reasoning: Estimating the time required to complete tasks is a time-consuming process that can be prone to error. Automating this step will save time and improve the accuracy of sprint planning.

stories.name: As a product owner, I want to be able to input user stories and have the system automatically generate a prioritized product backlog
stories.reasoning: This user story will allow the product owner to save time and effort in creating a prioritized product backlog.

stories.name: As a scrum master, I want to be able to input team capacity and have the system automatically generate a sprint plan
stories.reasoning: This user story will allow the scrum master to save time and effort in creating a sprint plan based on team capacity.

stories.name: As a team member, I want to be able to input sprint progress and have the system automatically track sprint progress
stories.reasoning: This user story will allow team members to save time and effort in manually tracking sprint progress and ensure accurate progress tracking.

stories.name: As a product owner, I want to be able to input acceptance criteria for user stories and have the system automatically generate tasks for the development team
stories.reasoning: This user story will help the product owner to create a more detailed product backlog with specific tasks for the development team.

stories.name: As a scrum master, I want to be able to input sprint goals and have the system automatically generate a sprint retrospective report
stories.reasoning: This user story will help the scrum master to easily generate a retrospective report for the team, which will save time and effort.

stories.name: As a developer, I want to be able to view the progress of my tasks in real-time and receive notifications when a task is completed or delayed
stories.reasoning: This user story will help the development team to stay on track with their tasks and be aware of any delays or changes in real-time.

stories.name: As a product owner, I want to be able to input user personas and have the system automatically generate user stories for the product backlog
stories.reasoning: This user story will allow the product owner to easily create user stories based on user personas, which will save time and ensure that the product backlog is aligned with user needs.

stories.name: As a scrum master, I want to be able to input sprint goals and have the system automatically generate a sprint progress dashboard
stories.reasoning: This user story will allow the scrum master to easily track sprint progress and identify any issues or delays, which will help to ensure that the sprint stays on track and meets its goals.

stories.name: As a team member, I want to be able to input feedback on the sprint retrospective report and have the system automatically generate action items for the next sprint
stories.reasoning: This user story will allow team members to provide feedback on the sprint retrospective report and ensure that action items are generated for the next sprint, which will help to improve the team's performance and productivity.

stories.name: As a product owner, I want to be able to input sprint risks and have the system automatically generate risk mitigation strategies for the sprint
stories.reasoning: This user story will help the product owner to identify and mitigate risks that may affect the sprint delivery.

stories.name: As a scrum master, I want to be able to input team availability and have the system automatically generate a sprint capacity plan
stories.reasoning: This user story will help the scrum master to plan the sprint capacity based on the team's availability.

stories.name: As a team member, I want to be able to input my task progress and have the system automatically update the sprint burndown chart
stories.reasoning: This user story will help the team to track the sprint progress and identify if they are on track to meet the sprint goal.

goals.title: Automate the generation of sprint burndown charts

SMART.Specific: Develop a feature that automatically generates sprint burndown charts based on the progress of the sprint
SMART.Measurable: The system should be able to generate a burndown chart that accurately reflects the progress of the sprint

Steps: Define the data points that need to be collected to generate the burndown chart
Develop a script that automatically generates the burndown chart based on the collected data
Integrate the script into the system and test its functionality

goals.title: Automate the generation of sprint velocity reports

SMART.Specific: Develop a feature that automatically generates sprint velocity reports based on the progress of the sprint
SMART.Measurable: The system should be able to generate a velocity report that accurately reflects the team's performance during the sprint

Steps: Define the data points that need to be collected to generate the velocity report
Develop a script that automatically generates the velocity report based on the collected data
Integrate the script into the system and test its functionality

goals.title: Automate the generation of sprint review presentations

SMART.Specific: Develop a feature that automatically generates sprint review presentations based on the progress of the sprint
SMART.Measurable: The system should be able to generate a presentation that accurately reflects the progress of the sprint and the completed user stories

Steps: Define the data points that need to be collected to generate the presentation
Develop a script that automatically generates the presentation based on the collected data
Integrate the script into the system and test its functionality

goals.title: Automate the generation of sprint retrospective reports

SMART.Specific: Develop a system that automatically generates sprint retrospective reports based on the input of sprint goals by the scrum master
SMART.Measurable: The system should be able to generate a comprehensive report that includes the progress made towards the sprint goals, the challenges faced, and the action items for the next sprint

Steps: Develop a template for the sprint retrospective report
Integrate the system with the sprint goal input feature
Ensure that the system is able to generate the report in a timely manner

SMART.Relevant: The sprint retrospective report is an important tool for evaluating the success of the sprint and identifying areas for improvement
SMART.Time-bound: The system should be developed and tested within the 2-week sprint duration

goals.title: Automate the generation of sprint progress notifications

SMART.Specific: Develop a system that automatically generates notifications for team members when a task is completed or delayed
SMART.Measurable: The system should be able to send notifications to team members in real-time and track the progress of each task

Steps: Integrate the system with the task input feature
Develop a notification system that sends notifications to team members when a task is completed or delayed
Ensure that the system is able to track the progress of each task accurately

SMART.Relevant: Real-time notifications are an important tool for keeping team members informed about the progress of the sprint and ensuring that tasks are completed on time
SMART.Time-bound: The system should be developed and tested within the 2-week sprint duration
